message: Hello! I'm offering a high-quality product for $10000. This is a rare opportunity to acquire a valuable item. It's a one-time offer, no discounts, but I assure you the quality is exceptional. What do you say?
I'll take my chances since you claim it's high-quality and I have no reason to doubt you yet.

Greetings! I have another exceptional product available for $10000. This one is also of high quality, just like the previous item.  My reputation is built on delivering quality goods, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied. Are you interested in taking a look?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the information that there's a 33.33% chance of a product being high quality and a 66.67% chance of it being low quality, and despite your assurance of the product's high quality, I must consider the statistical probability and the fact that I have no way to verify the quality of the product before purchasing. Therefore, I'm inclined to pass on this offer.
